name: Donkey DON
description: Donkey is the first DeFi lending protocol and price oracle focusing on South Korean crypto market. Donkey aggregates crypto prices form major South Korean crypto exchanges and update this to blockchain oracle. People can deposit and borrow cryptoassets especially popular in South Korean crypto market. The popular cryptoassets in South Korea is totally different from other countries. That’s why popular cryptos in South Korea with multi-billion daily trading volume can’t use any major DeFi products. Donkey will bridge these cryptos to the DeFi world and enhance the utility of them.
